How did you know what type of wire to cut?

psfponies <psfponies@...> wrote:          The 12-820 has wires not pins. I just clipped the mute wire. Just to 
make sure I clipped both ends!! It seems to be working fine. The Am 
band sweeps must slower than the FM band. 

Kay

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "reesclarke_69" <reesclarke_69@...> 
wrote:
>
> I was wondering if anybody ever post the hack for the RS 12-820? I 
> think I was told that the hack was the same as the 12-470, but I not 
> for sure. I am buying that radio today, and I would like to hack it 
> tonight. I guess all you hacve to do is cut the mute pin. Let me 
> know if this is correct, and have a great day
> 
> Thanks
> 
> William Rees Clarke
>
